title: bin/test fails in master
body:
## Setup
checkout master

### Versions

- **Rust:** rustc 1.48.0 (7eac88abb 2020-11-16)
- **Diesel:** bada4ad305d279049d0f9716ecde4735144c795c
- **Database:** postgres 13.2.1 mysql 5.5.62 sqlite3
- **Operating System**: debian buster

### Feature Flags

- **diesel:** the issue seems to be caused when both the postgres and sqlite features are enabled at the same time

## Problem Description
Right now bin/test fails on master out of the box.  It appears to trace back to https://github.com/diesel-rs/diesel/commit/11f4369ca

```
failures:

---- src/sqlite/expression/expression_methods.rs - sqlite::expression::expression_methods::SqliteExpressionMethods::is (line 20) stdout ----
error[E0271]: type mismatch resolving `<diesel::PgConnection as diesel::Connection>::Backend == Sqlite`
  --> src/sqlite/expression/expression_methods.rs:33:6
   |
14 |     .get_results::<Option<String>>(&connection)?;
   |      ^^^^^^^^^^^ expected struct `Pg`, found struct `Sqlite`
   |
   = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `LoadQuery<diesel::PgConnection, Option<String>>` for `SelectStatement<schema::animals::table, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::animals::columns::name>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<Grouped<sqlite::expression::operators::Is<schema::animals::columns::species, diesel::expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Text, &str>>>>>`

error: aborting due to previous error

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0271`.
Couldn't compile the test.
---- src/sqlite/expression/expression_methods.rs - sqlite::expression::expression_methods::SqliteExpressionMethods::is_not (line 55) stdout ----
error[E0271]: type mismatch resolving `<diesel::PgConnection as diesel::Connection>::Backend == Sqlite`
  --> src/sqlite/expression/expression_methods.rs:68:6
   |
14 |     .get_results::<Option<String>>(&connection)?;
   |      ^^^^^^^^^^^ expected struct `Pg`, found struct `Sqlite`
   |
   = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `LoadQuery<diesel::PgConnection, Option<String>>` for `SelectStatement<schema::animals::table, diesel::query_builder::select_clause::SelectClause<schema::animals::columns::name>, diesel::query_builder::distinct_clause::NoDistinctClause, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<Grouped<sqlite::expression::operators::IsNot<schema::animals::columns::species, diesel::expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Text, &str>>>>>`

error: aborting due to previous error

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0271`.
Couldn't compile the test.

failures:
    src/sqlite/expression/expression_methods.rs - sqlite::expression::expression_methods::SqliteExpressionMethods::is (line 20)
    src/sqlite/expression/expression_methods.rs - sqlite::expression::expression_methods::SqliteExpressionMethods::is_not (line 55)

test result: FAILED. 177 passed; 2 failed; 16 ignored; 0 measured; 0 filtered out

error: test failed, to rerun pass '--doc'
```

### What are you trying to accomplish?
Run tests in order to prepare to work on diesel

### What is the expected output?
working tests

### What is the actual output?
see above

### Are you seeing any additional errors?
no

### Steps to reproduce
checkout master
./bin/test

## Checklist

- [x] I have already looked over the [issue tracker](https://github.com/diesel-rs/diesel/issues)  and the [disussion forum](https://github.com/diesel-rs/diesel/discussions)  for similar possible closed issues.
- [ ] This issue can be reproduced on Rust's stable channel. (Your issue will be
  closed if this is not the case)
- [x] This issue can be reproduced without requiring a third party crate
